topics.title: Basic Greetings and Introductions
topics.description: Learn essential phrases for saying hello, goodbye, and introducing yourself. You'll practice basic pronunciation and understand cultural differences in greetings.

topics.title: Numbers and Counting
topics.description: Master numbers from 0-100, including basic math vocabulary. You'll learn to tell time, discuss prices, and handle basic numerical information in everyday situations.

topics.title: Family Members
topics.description: Learn vocabulary for immediate and extended family relationships. You'll be able to describe your family structure and ask others about their families.

topics.title: Colors and Basic Adjectives
topics.description: Study common colors and basic descriptive words. You'll learn to describe objects, clothes, and express simple preferences.

topics.title: Days, Months, and Seasons
topics.description: Master vocabulary related to time, including days of the week, months, and seasons. You'll learn to discuss dates and schedule simple appointments.

topics.title: Basic Food and Drinks
topics.description: Learn vocabulary for common foods, drinks, and basic restaurant phrases. You'll practice ordering simple meals and expressing basic preferences.

topics.title: Weather and Climate
topics.description: Study basic weather expressions and seasonal vocabulary. You'll learn to understand simple weather forecasts and discuss daily weather conditions.

topics.title: Classroom Objects
topics.description: Learn names of common objects found in a learning environment. You'll master basic classroom instructions and requests.

topics.title: Simple Present Tense
topics.description: Understanding and using the simple present tense for daily routines and facts. You'll learn to describe your daily activities and habits.

topics.title: Basic Questions
topics.description: Master essential question words and simple question formation. You'll learn to ask for basic information and understand simple responses.

topics.title: Parts of the Body
topics.description: Learn vocabulary for basic body parts and simple health expressions. You'll be able to describe basic physical conditions and pain.

topics.title: Transportation
topics.description: Study vocabulary for common modes of transportation. You'll learn to buy tickets and ask for basic directions.

topics.title: Houses and Rooms
topics.description: Learn vocabulary for different types of housing and rooms. You'll be able to describe your living space and basic furniture.

topics.title: Basic Clothing
topics.description: Master vocabulary for common clothing items and colors. You'll learn to describe what you're wearing and express simple preferences.

topics.title: Animals and Pets
topics.description: Learn names of common animals and basic pet-related vocabulary. You'll be able to describe pets and discuss basic animal characteristics.

topics.title: Simple Hobbies
topics.description: Study vocabulary for common hobbies and leisure activities. You'll learn to discuss what you like to do in your free time.

topics.title: Basic Emotions
topics.description: Learn to express and understand basic emotions and feelings. You'll master simple phrases to describe how you feel.

topics.title: Numbers in Context
topics.description: Practice using numbers in real-life situations like shopping and time-telling. You'll learn to handle basic monetary transactions.

topics.title: Personal Information
topics.description: Master vocabulary for sharing and asking about personal details. You'll learn to fill out simple forms and share basic information about yourself.

topics.title: Basic Commands
topics.description: Learn to understand and use simple imperative forms. You'll master basic instructions and classroom commands.

topics.title: Shopping and Prices
topics.description: Learn vocabulary and phrases for shopping, including asking about prices and sizes. You'll practice haggling and understanding basic product descriptions.

topics.title: Past Experiences
topics.description: Master the simple past tense to talk about recent experiences. You'll learn to describe what you did yesterday or last weekend.

topics.title: Making Plans
topics.description: Study future tense structures and vocabulary for planning events. You'll learn to make, accept, and decline invitations.

topics.title: Daily Routines
topics.description: Expand vocabulary related to daily activities and habits. You'll learn to describe your typical day in detail.

topics.title: Restaurant Ordering
topics.description: Master more complex restaurant vocabulary and ordering phrases. You'll learn to make special requests and understand menu descriptions.

topics.title: Health and Illness
topics.description: Learn vocabulary for common ailments and medical situations. You'll practice describing symptoms and understanding basic medical advice.

topics.title: Jobs and Occupations
topics.description: Study vocabulary related to different professions and workplaces. You'll learn to discuss job responsibilities and career aspirations.

topics.title: Describing People
topics.description: Master advanced adjectives for describing physical appearance and personality. You'll learn to give detailed descriptions of people.

topics.title: House and Furniture
topics.description: Expand vocabulary for household items and furniture. You'll learn to describe your home in detail and discuss housing preferences.

topics.title: Travel and Tourism
topics.description: Learn vocabulary for travel planning and tourist activities. You'll practice booking accommodations and asking for tourist information.

topics.title: Hobbies and Free Time
topics.description: Expand vocabulary for leisure activities and entertainment. You'll learn to discuss your interests in more detail.

topics.title: Weather Patterns
topics.description: Study more complex weather vocabulary and expressions. You'll learn to discuss climate patterns and weather forecasts.

topics.title: Celebrations and Festivals
topics.description: Learn vocabulary related to holidays and cultural celebrations. You'll practice describing traditional festivities and customs.

topics.title: Public Transportation
topics.description: Master vocabulary for using different types of public transport. You'll learn to ask for directions and handle travel situations.

topics.title: School and Education
topics.description: Study vocabulary related to educational systems and academic life. You'll learn to discuss school subjects and educational experiences.

topics.title: Shopping for Clothes
topics.description: Learn detailed vocabulary for clothing and fashion. You'll practice describing styles and making purchases.

topics.title: Food and Cooking
topics.description: Expand vocabulary for ingredients and cooking methods. You'll learn to follow simple recipes and discuss food preferences.

topics.title: Technology Basics
topics.description: Study vocabulary for common technology and devices. You'll learn to discuss basic computer and smartphone usage.

topics.title: Sports and Exercise
topics.description: Learn vocabulary for different sports and physical activities. You'll practice discussing sports events and exercise routines.

topics.title: Simple Opinions
topics.description: Master phrases for expressing and justifying basic opinions. You'll learn to agree and disagree politely.

topics.title: Work Environment
topics.description: Learn professional vocabulary and office communication. You'll practice job interviews, workplace interactions, and professional email writing.

topics.description: Master vocabulary related to environment and sustainability. You'll learn to discuss environmental problems and solutions.
